竛字的基本解释

竛
líng
〔竛竮（
p妌g ）〕ａ．行走不稳，如“薄游成汗漫，高步觉竛竛。”ｂ．孤单；孤独，如“地偏寒浩荡，春半客竛竛。”

竛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［líng］
［《廣韻》郎丁切，平青，來。］
见“竛竮”。

竛字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【立字部】　竛； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页870第33
【廣韻】【集韻】?郞丁切，音靈。竛竮，行不正。　亦作伶俜。

竛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
竛字的起名意思

暂无。

竛
Basic explanation of words
竛
líng
〔竛竮(
p 妌g )] a. Unsteady walking, such as "Thin swimming becomes perspiration, high step feels 竛竛." b. Loneliness; loneliness, such as "The ground is cold and mighty, and the spring is half a guest."
竛
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［líng］
["Guangyun" Lang Dingqie, Pingqing, come. ]
See "竛竮".
竛
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Li Zi Department] 　竛; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: page 870 33
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yin Dingqie, the sound is good.竛竮, not right.　Also used as Ling Ling.
